Module contents¶

Short library to count substrings in binary files and measure performance

myparser.argparser module¶

Library that gets and processes the arguments given by the user

myparser.argparser.get_args()¶

Function that reads the argument input. Returns the arguments

Returns:Object containing file path, encoding and min length
Return type:object
myparser.argparser.validate_args(decoding_args)¶

Function that verifies if the arguments values are valid

Returns:‘True’ if ok else ‘False’
Return type:bool

myparser.performance module¶

Library that compares performance between substring finding functions

myparser.performance.measure_performance(encoding, min_substring_len, times_to_avg, len_list, functions)¶

Function that given an encoding, a minimum substring length, the number of times to get an average value, the string length iterator, and the functions to compare measures the time required to find the substrings

Parameters:
  • encoding (str) – Encoding method
  • min_substring_len (int) – Minimum substring length in characters
  • times_to_avg (int) – Number of times to get average
  • len_list (list) – List of string length values
  • functions (list) – List of functions to test

myparser.stringparser module¶

Library that gets substrings repetition using parameters

myparser.stringparser.get_substrings_repetitions_dict(file_to_decode, encoding, min_substring_len)¶

Function that parses a UTF-X file to find substrings repeated more than once, with a length greater than the minimum substring size parameter using a dictionary

Parameters:
  • file_to_decode (file) – File to decode
  • encoding (str) – Encoding method
  • min_substring_len (int) – Minimum substring length in characters
Returns:

Dictionary with the substring as key and the number of occurrences as value
Return type:

dict
myparser.stringparser.get_substrings_repetitions_set(file_to_decode, encoding, min_substring_len)¶

Function that parses a UTF-X file to find substrings repeated more than once, with a length greater than the minimum substring size parameter using a set

Parameters:
  • file_to_decode (file) – File to decode
  • encoding (str) – Encoding method
  • min_substring_len (int) – Minimum substring length in characters
Returns:

Dictionary with the substring as key and the number of occurrences as value
Return type:

dict
